items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice fit
items.body: Super cute dress! I’m on the shorter side so was a litttle long but paired with some boots and honestly I loved it. It was comfortable and not itchy. Great for the price Read more
items.author: Cassandra Muheize

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love It!
items.body: Dress came in a vacuum sealed bag so it was wrinkled, but it is in great condition and looks great on. Love how it hugs my shape. I'm 5'3 +, weigh around 150 and purchased the large. The inside fabric is soft with a nice light mesh sleeve and outside layer of the dress. The stretch in the fabric will make this a nice comfortable dress to wear all night long. I was worried about the length, but the ruching makes it easy to make the dress longer or shorter. I just absolutely love it and can't wait to wear it to my event. Read more
items.author: M

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and elegant
items.body: Slightly see through, but very elegant. Comfortable and accurate sizing. I got a small. I am 5’4” and 125lbs. Read more
items.author: Hannah lamb

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and Looks Like the Photos!
items.body: Beautiful dress! It looks just like the photos. I am 5'1 and it fit me perfectly length wise. It is really soft, thick material. It is incredibly tight to the body and will show every little curve so just keep that in mind. Read more
items.author: Candice Rose

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great find and closet staple!
items.body: Loving the fit and material of this dress. For price I was hesitant on quality but to my surprise and now going to order couple more colors. Great for any occasion fits like a glove. Can wear casual or can be dressed up! Read more
items.author: grace6w

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Previously worn - body odor
items.body: Beautiful dress. Unsatisfied with the fact that the dress smells like it has been worn and there is an obvious body odor. Read more
items.author: Britt

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars It’s okay
items.body: Dress came inside out and with dog hair all over it. After washing it, it fit great though. Read more
items.author: Madeleine B

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Fit
items.body: Absolutely beautiful, great price, a definite would buy again. I did in Navy Blue. I'm 5'6" 135 lbs bought medium fits perfect. Read more
items.author: Connie

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Bodycon Ruched Maxi Cocktail is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Bodycon Ruched Maxi Cocktail is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Dark Green, Red, Navy, Wine Red, White, Royal Blue, Black, Coffee. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
